ygData.subject: RE: Kunark and new stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t blame the system type John.  There are plenty of ways to get around the level based difficulties, its just that most of them don t bother to try.
ygData.messageBody:
>Let me guess. The levels after 50 are all hellish enough that
>other classes get new spells at the increased rate of every
>level instead of every 4-5. We will still get one song per
>level though...

>I *really* hate level-based systems...
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...

Don't blame the system type John. There are plenty of ways to get around
the level based difficulties, its just that most of them don't bother to
try. Looks like the casters will be getting around 1-2 spells per level
(including hybrids it looks like) If we only get one per level it better be
one really good one!

Kit
